mix.title: Sorrow-Vomit: 2021-01-10 (2021/20 Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Cold Wave, Synth, Goth)
mix.shortTitle: 2021-01-10 (2021/20 Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Cold Wave, Synth, Goth)
mix.description:
Recorded live. International 80s post-punk, coldwave, goth, minimal synth, dark new wave, etc.
